page.title: 16LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content:
The lessons are on Saturday morning at 10.00am.It costs Â£5.00 and a subscription of Â£1.00 per week.{ { { 'Breakin' Club.
In Hale Community Centre on Wednesday a 'Breakin' Club is held.All you need is suitable clothes,music,gettoblaster and a piece of lino or mat.You can learn more moves,such as the Windmill, heilcopter,and crazy legs,and you can have a burn,which is a pairs' contest.
{ Ju-jitsu. }
The Ju-jitsu club is held at the Community Centre in Upper Hale from 6pm-8pm on Thursdays.The men's session is then on from 8pm-9.30pm.You can wear a tracksuit when you first join or you can buy a white baggy suit.
